# Load necessary libraries

```{r}

library(Seurat)
library(Matrix)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(circlize)

```

# Set theme

```{r}

theme_set(
  theme_bw(20) +
    theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.border = element_rect(colour="black", fill = NA, size = 1),
          axis.text = element_text(colour="black"),
          axis.ticks = element_line(colour="black"),
          axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0),
          legend.title = element_text(size = 10),
          legend.text = element_text(size = 7)))

```

# Read in VDJdb & TCRseq data

```{r}
 
vdjdb <- read.csv("../../vdjdb_11_21_23.tsv", sep = "\t") %>%
  select(-Reference, -Method, -Meta, -CDR3fix) %>%
  rename(Chain = Gene,
         cdr3 = CDR3,
         v_gene = V,
         j_gene = J)

vdjdb

tcr_seq <- read.csv("../saved_data/tcr_seq_features.csv") %>%
  left_join(vdjdb, by = c("Chain", "v_gene", "j_gene", "cdr3")) %>%
  group_by(Epitope.species) %>%
  summarize(count = n())

tcr_seq

```
